channel.title: N.T. Rama Rao Jr. on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in N.T. Rama Rao Jr. on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘War 2’ Review: Bollywood’s Shared-Universe Spy Saga Takes a Nosedive
item.description: Ayan Mukerji’s “War 2” — the sequel to “War” (2019) and the sixth entry in Yash Raj Films’ inter-connected Spy Universe — gives its screen stars larger-than-life introductions. However, it denies them
